problem: Uzbek weddings involve immense social pressure to look expensive, but buying a $1,000+ dress for one day is financially draining. Currently, renting requires physically visiting chaotic bazaars (like Qatortol) or scattered boutiques, with opaque pricing and no central catalog to compare styles.
audience: The Modern Bride (18-26): Tech-savvy, Instagram user, wants luxury looks on a budget, values time over bazaar haggling.
The Boutique Owner: Struggling with inconsistent foot traffic and manual scheduling via notebooks.
The 'Ex-Bride' Lender: Has a $2,000 dress sitting in a closet and wants to recoup costs via P2P rental.
user_stories: As a Bride, I want to filter dresses by 'Hijab-friendly' or 'European style' so I don't waste time on irrelevant options.
As a Bride, I want to book a specific 1-hour fitting slot and pay a small deposit via Click/Payme to secure my time.
As a Boutique Owner, I want to receive fitting requests directly in Telegram so I don't miss customers while tending to the shop.
As a Lender, I want to hold the renter's passport details or a security deposit digitally to ensure my dress is returned safe.

mvp: Visual Catalog: High-res image feed with filters (Price, Size, Style, Location).
Booking System: Calendar for scheduling 'Fitting Appointments' (not immediate rental).
Local Payment Gateway: Click & Payme integration for small 'Fitting Deposits' (e.g., 50,000 UZS) to reduce no-shows.
Telegram Bot Integration: Automated reminders for appointments and location pins for boutiques.
Review System: photo-based reviews from real weddings to build trust.
future: Home Try-On Service: Courier delivers 3 dresses for a home fitting session (Premium service).
AI Stylist: Upload a photo to see how the dress fits your body type.
Cross-selling: Makeup artists and photographers marketplace integration.
Dress Insurance: Coverage for accidental wine spills or tears during the wedding.

monetization: Hybrid Model: 1. SaaS Subscription for Boutiques (Monthly fee to list inventory). 2. 'Fitting Fee' Commission (We take the small booking deposit as a service fee, or split it with the boutique). 3. Promoted Listings (Top of search results).
